body.name: Verbatim Wired USB Computer Mouse - Corded USB Mouse for Laptops and PCs - Right or Left Hand Use, Black 98106,Glossy Black, 1.2" x 2.3" x 3.8"
deliveryMessages: This item cannot be shipped to your selected delivery location. Please choose a different delivery location.
features: Computer mouse with a contoured ambidextrous design that fits comfortably in your hand with a sleek, glossy finish
Plug and play USB corded connection ready for instant use
High-resolution optical technology for smooth and precise tracking; scroll wheel for smooth and precise scrolling
Windows, MacOS, Chrome OS, Linux Kernel 2.6 and higher compatible
Verbatim has been a leader in data storage technology since 1969, and guarantees this product with a 1-year limited warranty and technical support
body.description: Stylish mouse has been ergonomically designed to fit your hand comfortably. With its high-resolution optical technology, the Bravo Wired Notebook Optical Mouse also offers smooth, precise tracking and a precision scroll wheel for easy scrolling. It's ideal for your notebook, ultrabook and desktop computer. This mouse is also compatible with PCs and Macs and plugs into a USB 2. 0 or USB 1. 1 port.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great buy. Works great and comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the red and black design, bought 3 for my work. It's wired and no issues what so ever. Clicks left or right no problem. It's my go to mouse at work and everyone likes to use it because it works with any kind of device. Easy recognition immediately when plugged in. Very pleased with this wired mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars standard mouse, great price!
reviews.reviewText: The Verbatim Wired USB Computer Mouse is a reliable and ergonomic device that offers smooth and precise navigation. It features a high-resolution optical sensor that delivers accurate cursor control and a scroll wheel that enables easy scrolling through documents and web pages. The mouse has a comfortable shape that fits both left and right-handed users, and a 1.8-meter long cable that provides ample reach. The mouse is compatible with Windows, Mac, and Linux operating systems, and requires no software installation. Simply plug it into a USB port and start using it right away. The Verbatim Wired USB Computer Mouse is an affordable and durable option for everyday computing needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable shape and good accuracy
reviews.reviewText: Simple wired mouse. Works well with good accuracy. Small enough for small hands and very comfortable.Note: It gave me erratic uncontrolable moves on an older DVI multiscreen switich.but works perfectly when directly plugged into desktop computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bang for the buck!
reviews.reviewText: For the price, this is a very good ambidextrous mouse. I personally wish it were a tad larger but that's a very minor nit-pik. It's not a quiet mouse but again you take the price into consideration. It's all plastic construction but it doesn't feel flimsy-cheap. You can game with it as long as the game doesn't require more than the a basic mouse layout. Like Half Life 2/Black Mesa as an example.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It does what it’s supposed to do. Get it!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a wired mouse as a security feature for a work from home which only requires hardwired work tools)- I mention this because I haven’t used a wired mouse since I-don't-remember-what-year and have very little experience with it.So, I ordered it (in BLACK) two nights ago and it arrived the next day by 6:30pm.The mouse is easy to use. (I used it on a Windows computer, so I am not sure if it works with Mac. (I’ll try later & update this review.) Left and right buttons click fast, middle roller thing isn’t stiff; holding sides are smoooooth- and easy to clean.It's also important to say that, I tried out the mouse without a mouse pad- (just the surface of my kitchen counter) It connects fast and is soft to touch, therefore easy to use. No complaints so far, and I am satisfied with how fast it arrived. I’ll update this review after using the laptop for a week to share any further updates, if necessary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Your most basic $5 mouse, good for 2 months or so..
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for an economical Mouse, $5 - $6 to resell and for the amount of time I spend at the computer, one that I can use as well. So far I have tried the Rii Mouse, Verbatim and this one the HONGDE.The HONGDE:This thing is HONGDE (Huge and Heavy)! It is very Slow - when moving and dragging the cursor creeps around the screen. Don't know if this has anything to do with its DPI setting. I did a few searches on Google and found nothing on how to adjust this. The buttons seem to be accurate and making good solid contact when clicking but because of its slowness in movement, using the mouse seems unresponsive. Overall, using this mouse is uncomfortable, tiring and very time wasting.The Rii Mouse:This is a real nice looking mouse; good size and good weight. It has good speed when moving and dragging. The buttons has a balanced tactile clicking action. This mouse was on its way to becoming my perfect under $6 mouse until I started using it seriously. The clicking contacts are erratic, like they are shorting. When I press and hold a button to highlight or drag it does not maintain contact even though I still have the button depressed. Then it will get worse as it will regain contact. So the mouse buttons will make contact, lose contact and regain contact erratically when depressed. Well we know that practically all Windows Based Software have specialized functions tied to the clicking action of the Mouse - positioning, highlighting, copying, cutting, pasting are the basics. Imagine these functions happening unpredictably when you are trying to work. Screwed up Documents and Worksheets mayhem. This clicking and contacting inconsistency makes the Rii Mouse very frustrating and even impossible to use.Verbatim:The Verbatim while not as pretty, looks and feels similar to the Rii Mouse, same size and weight and a little faster movement. Of all three Mice it has the most natural responsive feel. However, after about 2 to 3 months max of daily use the button contacts get worn and it begins to exhibit the same erratic and unpredictable behavior like the Rii Mouse, described above. I am changing my 3rd Verbatim Mouse today for this same reason, erratic, inconsistent, unpredictable behavior, the same as I had to change the 1st and 2nd ones.Remember I was buying these Mice for resale. I tried at least 3 or more of each of the three brands and the issues I explained for each were consistently the same for all that I tried.I will be rating them as follows - HONGDE - 2 Stars Rii Mouse - 1 Star Verbatim - 3 Stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024

reviews.reviewText: uno de los ratones mejores que eh probado, la calidad es buena y la medida perfecta para mano pequeña. el material es de la mejor calidad espero que me dure unos 10 años.

I needed a good mouse to travel with me and my laptop. The wireless ones only seem to last a short time before they stop working. This one is corded so I never have to look for batteries, it seems very durable and works great. Its a very reasonable price
